bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for AC High-Voltage Air Switches Rated Above 1000 V -- Amendment 1: Criteria for acceptance
IEEE Standard Requirements for AC High-Voltage Air Switches Rated Above 1000 V -- Amendment 1: Criteria for acceptance
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.30.1a-2017 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.30.1-2011)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Mechanical operations tests that are applicable for all equipment covered by the complete standard, IEEE Std IEEE C37.30.1(TM)-2011, are covered in this amendment. It further defines criteria for acceptance at the completion of the tests.

Mechanical operations tests that are applicable for all equipment covered by the complete standard, IEEE Std IEEE C37.30.1(TM)-2011, are covered in this amendment. It further defines criteria for acceptance at the completion of the tests.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
